question: Покажи всех активных сотрудников
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, department_id, grade, salary_grade, hire_date FROM employees WHERE is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников с зарплатой выше 100000
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary, department_id, salary_grade FROM employees WHERE salary > 100000 AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи список всех департаментов
sql: SELECT id, name, manager_id, location FROM departments;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников из отдела продаж
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, salary_grade, salary FROM employees WHERE department_id = (SELECT id FROM departments WHERE name = 'Sales') AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников с грейдом D1
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary, hire_date, department_id FROM employees WHERE salary_grade = 'D1' AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, нанятых в этом году
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, hire_date, department_id, salary_grade FROM employees WHERE YEAR(hire_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи список всех материалов
sql: SELECT id, name, material_type, unit_of_measure, price_per_unit, currency FROM materials;

question: Покажи все активные спецификации (BOM)
sql: SELECT id, product_id, version, status, created_at, created_by FROM boms WHERE status = 'active';

question: Покажи все компоненты для спецификации с ID 5
sql: SELECT material_id, component_type, quantity_per_unit, unit_of_measure, cost_per_unit, cost_currency FROM bom_components WHERE bom_id = 5 AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все продукты
sql: SELECT id, name, category, department, unit_weight, created_at FROM products;

question: Покажи продукт с артикулом PROD-001
sql: SELECT id, name, category, department, unit_weight FROM products WHERE id = 'PROD-001';

question: Покажи все программы обучения
sql: SELECT id, name, duration_days, is_mandatory, description FROM training_program;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, прошедших обучение по 'Safety Training'
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.department_id, et.completion_date, et.grade FROM employees e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id JOIN training_program tp ON et.program_id = tp.id WHERE tp.name = 'Safety Training' AND et.enrollment_status = 'completed';

question: Покажи текущую структуру окладов
sql: SELECT grade, step, base_salary, currency, effective_date FROM salary_structure WHERE effective_date <= CURDATE() AND (expiration_date IS NULL OR expiration_date >= CURDATE());

question: Покажи всех сотрудников без указанных данных о грейде
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary, department_id, hire_date FROM employees WHERE salary_grade IS NULL AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все завершённые курсы обучения за текущий месяц
sql: SELECT employee_id, program_id, enrollment_date, completion_date, grade FROM employee_training WHERE enrollment_status = 'completed' AND MONTH(completion_date) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(completion_date) = YEAR(CURDATE());

question: Покажи материалы в рублях
sql: SELECT id, name, price_per_unit, unit_of_measure FROM materials WHERE currency = 'RUB';

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, у кого зарплата ниже 80000
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary, department_id, salary_grade FROM employees WHERE salary < 80000 AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все обязательные программы обучения
sql: SELECT id, name, duration_days, description FROM training_program WHERE is_mandatory = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, работающих в Москве
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, department_id, salary_grade, salary FROM employees WHERE location = 'Moscow' AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все компоненты типа 'metal'
sql: SELECT bom_id, material_id, quantity_per_unit, cost_per_unit FROM bom_components WHERE component_type = 'metal' AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи среднюю зарплату по компании
sql: SELECT ROUND(AVG(salary), 2) as avg_salary FROM employees WHERE is_active = true;

question: Покажи количество сотрудников в компании
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as employee_count FROM employees WHERE is_active = true;

question: Покажи самый дорогой материал
sql: SELECT id, name, price_per_unit, currency FROM materials ORDER BY price_per_unit DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников с фамилией Иванов
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, department_id, salary, salary_grade FROM employees WHERE last_name = 'Иванов' AND is_active = true;
